text: R.M. Renfield is a fictional character in Dracula by Bram Stoker. Renfield lives in a Mental hospital and eats bugs to make himself immortal. Renfield helps Count Dracula because Dracula feeds him mice. When Renfield notices that Dracula bit Mina Harker, he attacks Dracula and tries to kill him but loses. Renfield then tells his psychiatrist Dr. Seward about everything he did. Then Dracula kills Renfield for it. Category:Characters in written fiction
title: Renfield (character)
